name: The bird that can make it
name_original: The bird that can make it
description:
Times are not easy, He tries to stay calm, so he has to remember the affirmation. But he is forgetting. Help him find it and remember.

Controls:

  • z - try to remember
  • x - change color of trying
  • up/down - aim 

TweetTweet Jam Game, done in 2h , 544 chars

You can NOT win. That's just it. Sorry.
